title: Path To Origin (Part 3)
body:
Path To Origin (Part 3)

"It will be difficult..." Evan said, gazing at a water pond that was around two kilometres in diameter.

In the middle of the pond, a small silver coloured lotus flower was blooming, radiating high spiritual power.

The name of the silver lotus was Soul Lotus, and it was a Mid Level Rank Three flower. Just by refining this flower, a normal beginner level Rank One Core Evolver can boost their spiritual power to the peak of Rank One.

Evan was currently a mid level Rank One Core Evolver, but his spiritual power was already slightly higher than that of a Peak Rank One Core Evolver. He was sure that by refining the Soul Lotus, he would be able to push his spiritual power to the Beginner Level of Rank Two.

But the problem was that it was not easy to collect the Soul Lotus, which was a Rank Three Treasure. The Soul Lotus was a spiritual flower with a high level of spirituality.
